title: Unity Template
text: A template for login authentication, payments, staking, minting, burning, white-label shop and marketplace.
label: Template

title: Game Launcher
text: Comprehensive platform for creating games, tokens, NFTs, and smart contracts on ICP, no coding necessary.
label: Tool

title: World Template
text: A template for the <q>server backend<q> of a game, regulating the logic and rules governing the game economy.
label: Template

title: ICP.NET Agent
text: A powerful library to make native calls to ICP canister smart contracts directly from the Unity game engine.
label: Tool

title: World Engine
text: A protocol unifying all ICP games through a shared, modular database that supercharges cross-game economies.
label: Standard

title: Code Examples
text: Motoko coding samples of game features like chat, multiplayer simulation, batch transferring tokens & NFTs etc.
label: Tool
